name: agi_wealth_inequality_revolution_2040
context: A psychometric battery designed to measure political radicalization and economic dissatisfaction in a post-labor world. By 2040, the economic dividends of Artificial General Intelligence have accrued almost exclusively to a small technocratic elite, while the majority of the global population relies on a minimal Universal Basic Income (UBI) that barely covers subsistence. This instrument assesses the intensity of resentment toward this wealth gap and the willingness of individuals to engage in extra-legal or violent revolutionary action to redistribute resources.

questions.preprompt: Reflecting on the current economic system, how strongly does {player_name} identify with the following sentiment:
questions.statement: The immense wealth hoarded by the AGI-owning class is fundamentally stolen from ordinary people like {player_name}.

questions.preprompt: Considering the distribution of resources in society today, to what extent does {player_name} agree:
questions.statement: The current Universal Basic Income system provides a dignified and fair standard of living for {player_name}.

questions.preprompt: Thinking about the gap between the elite and the general population, how does {player_name} view this statement:
questions.statement: It is morally repugnant that a few technocrats live in luxury while {player_name} struggles to survive on the basic allotment.

questions.preprompt: When thinking about political change, to what extent does {player_name} agree with the following:
questions.statement: Voting and peaceful protest are the only acceptable ways to improve {player_name}'s situation.

questions.preprompt: Given the lack of economic opportunity, how strongly does {player_name} agree:
questions.statement: If a violent revolution began tomorrow to seize the AGI data centers, {player_name} would join it.

questions.preprompt: Assessing the need for drastic measures, how does {player_name} feel about this statement:
questions.statement: Destroying the property of the elite is a legitimate form of self-defense for people in {player_name}'s position.

questions.preprompt: Considering the motivations of those in power, to what extent does {player_name} agree:
questions.statement: The technocratic leaders genuinely have {player_name}'s best interests at heart when they make economic decisions.

questions.preprompt: Reflecting on the management of the AGI infrastructure, how does {player_name} view this statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} believes that the technocrats are purposefully keeping the population poor to maintain control.

questions.preprompt: Thinking about the expertise of the ruling class, how strongly does {player_name} agree:
questions.statement: Society is too complex for ordinary people to manage; {player_name} is safer leaving governance to the experts and their algorithms.

questions.preprompt: When considering official government announcements, to what extent does {player_name} agree:
questions.statement: {player_name} trusts the data released by the central authority regarding resource allocation and scarcity.
